The Hard Earth

The Hard Earth Trailer

A trailer for the experimental documentary charting the relationship of five Ukrainians and one Ukrainian American to the 2014 revolution and preceding war. Previous screenings include The Nightingale, Echo Park Film Center, and Mini Microcinema.
